{"blocks":[{"key":"cmr6k","text":"You will need 3 LB Agar + Cam plates (36 total)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b5a2d","text":"Prepare three 2.0 mL tubes (36 total) with 1900 μL of LB + Cam media for Dilutions 1, 2, and 3","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"sbbe","text":"Prepare two 1.5 mL tubes (24 total) with 900 μL of LB + Cam media for Dilutions 4 and 5","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c6nad","text":"Label each tube according to the figure above (Dilution 1, etc.) for each Starting Sample","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2gdf6","text":"Pipet 100 μL of Starting Culture into Dilution 1. Discard tip. Do NOT pipette up and down. Vortex tube for 5-10 secs","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fr03n","text":"Repeat Step 11 for each dilution through to Dilution 5 as shown above","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8rqck","text":"Aseptically spead plate 100 μL on LB + Cam plates for Dilutions 3, 4, and 5","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9e2gq","text":"Incubate at 37 °C overnight and count colonies after 18-20 hours of growth","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6m07k","text":"Based on the assumption that 1 bacterial cell gives rise to 1 colony,  colony forming units (CFU) per 1mL of an OD600 = 0.1 culture can be calculated","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":114,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cidjl","text":"First, count the colonies on each plate with fewer than 300 colonies","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1f6vg","text":"Next, multiply the colony count by the Final Dilution Factor on each plate","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"9acnl","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"5gfmp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"result","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":36,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"10bea","text":"Example using Dilution 4 from above:","type":"unstyled"},{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"57oph","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"8c50t","text":"# colonies  x  Final Dilution Factor = CFU/mL     ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":1,"offset":27,"style":"sup"},{"length":1,"offset":58,"style":"sup"},{"length":3,"offset":91,"style":"sub"}],"key":"2th84","text":"125              x  (8 x 105)                     = 1 x 108 CFU ⁄ mL in Starting Sample (OD600 = 0.1)","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{},"guid":"FDD5FF9E3D0B46DE8F89950663CA00F0"}}}}
